mapper.select: SELECT tbgrantuser.id ,tbgrantuser.created_at as createdAt ,tbgrantuser.modified_at as modifiedAt ,tbgrantuser.tbgrant_id as tbgrantId ,tbgrantuser.tbuser_id as tbuserId ,tbgrantuser.content ,tbgrantuser.deleted ,IF(tbuser.deleted = 'Y', '(deleted)', tbuser.nick) as tbuserNick ,IF(tbuser.deleted = 'Y', '', tbuser.mpic) as tbuserMpic FROM tbgrantuser, tbuser WHERE tbgrantuser.tbuser_id = tbuser.id AND tbgrantuser.id = #{id}
